title: JUMISEE Embroidery Satin Homecoming Dress with Bow Modest Strapless Mini Dress A Line Short Prom Dress Party Gown
description: CLASSY & ELEGANT: This is a classy strapless homecoming dress with a pretty bow on the back, delicate satin embroidery and and flared hemline make the dresses elegant to wear. And the slender waist is to outline your body and emphasize your curves for a captivating look.

SOFT & COMFY: This mini dress is made of 95% polyester and 5% elastane, the high quality jacquard satin material makes the dress look very textured, it’s skin-friendly, breathable and comfortable to wear.

FEATURES: This elegant homecoming dress features strapless, sleeveless, flared hemline, a line, backless, slim fit and big bowknot on back. Zipper closure allows for quick dressing and lace-up straps on the back allows you to adjust the dress to the best fit.

OCCASIONS: This beautiful mini dress is perfect for cocktail party, homecoming party, Christmas banquet, New Year party, evening party, birthday party, prom, ball, bridal shower, graduation party, wedding party, dinner party, Valentine’s Day, engagement, anniversary, formal occasions, etc.
KINDLY NOTE: Machine washable. Please refer to the size chart we offered in the product description to find your best fit. Thanks.
